channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - DEPEND

item.title: No more DEPENDs for SELinux policy package dependencies
item.description:
I just finished updating 102 packages. The change? Removing the following from the ebuilds:

DEPEND="selinux? ( sec-policy/selinux-${packagename} )"

In the past, we needed this construction in both DEPEND and RDEPEND. Recently however, the SELinux eclass got updated with some logic to relabel files after the policy package is deployed â€¦
